participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Caring and somewhat introspective, with a passion for creativity and nature.
participant_1.background: I enjoy being able to help my mother out when she needs me. I don't know if I enjoy programming, or if it's my only choice. I like to dye my hair blue because it reminds me of the ocean. I am the only member of my immediate family who is not employed by Sears. I have long flowing hair.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, with a love for sports and dogs.
participant_2.background: I am not sure what my family members do for a living. Traveling and making friends is something I find delightful. I play for the Philadelphia Eagles. I enjoy spending my time with my two beagles, Chance and Boomer. I go running a lot.

content.text: Hello there!
Hi there! How's your day going?
Pretty good. Just got back from running. What about you?
Not bad. I'm going to go running later today.
Oh nice. What kind of dog do you have?
I have two beagles, Chance and Boomer.
Aww. They sound cute. What do you like to do with them?
I like to take them to the park and play fetch.
That sounds like fun. I love playing fetch with dogs.
Me too. It's a great way to get exercise and have fun at the same time.
I agree. Do you have any other hobbies?
I love traveling and making new friends.
That sounds like fun. Where have you traveled to recently?
I just got back from Hawaii. It was amazing!
Wow! I've always wanted to go to Hawaii.
It's definitely worth a visit.
I'm sure it is. I'm jealous!
You should go sometime.
I will. Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem.
